thread.title: Syria's last rebels near Damascus poised to surrender

title: Syria's last rebels near Damascus poised to surrender
text:
Syria's last rebels near Damascus poised to surrender 7:31pm BST - 01:30 
Syrian state media says a deal has been struck to evacuate the last rebel group from Douma, in eastner Ghouta - the last rebel stronghold near the capital Damascus. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Syrian state media says a deal has been struck to evacuate the last rebel group from Douma, in eastner Ghouta - the last rebel stronghold near the capital Damascus. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2H1TnbA
